00023              /**
00024               * a copy of the matching db-config entry in config/database.php
00025               * @var array
00026               */
00027              public $dbconfig= null;
00028 
00029              /**
00030               * a placeholder for any result the database returned
00031               * @var array
00032               */
00033              private $result= null;
00034 
00035              /**
00036               * a placeholder for the database link needed for this database
00037               * @var int
00038               */
00039              private $link= null;
00040 
00041              /**
00042               * are we already connected? used to connect to the database in the last possible moment to save unneeded connects
00043               * @var boolean
00044               */
00045              private $connected= false;
00046 
00047              /**
00048               * an array that holds all queries and some relevant information about them if DEBUG
00049               * @var array
00050               */
00051              private $queries= array ();

00054               * constants used to quote table and field names

00057              public $quoteLeft= '[';

00060              /**
00061               * connect to the database
00062               */
00063              function connect() {
00064                           $this->link= mssql_connect($this->dbconfig['host'], $this->dbconfig['login'], $this->dbconfig['password']);
00065                           if (!$this->link) {
00066                                        throw new DatabaseConnectException("Could not connect to Database ".$this->dbconfig['host']);
00067                           }
00068                           if (!empty ($this->dbconfig['database'])) {
00069                                        if (!mssql_select_db($this->dbconfig['database'], $this->link)) {
00070                                                     throw new DatabaseConnectException("Could not select Database ".$this->dbconfig['database']);
00071                                        }
00072                           }
00073 
00074                           $this->connected= true;
00075 
00076                           //freetds hack
00077                           if (!function_exists("mssql_next_result")) {
00078                                        function mssql_next_result($res= null) {
00079                                                     return false;
00080                                        }
00081                           }
00082              }
00083 
00084              function isConnected() {
00085                           return $this->connected;
00086              }
00087 
00088              /**
00089               * return the current link to the database, connect first if needed
00090               */
00091              public function getLink() {
00092                           if (!$this->connected) {
00093                                        $this->connect();
00094                           }
00095                           return $this->link;
00096              }
00097 
00098              public function setLink($l) {
00099                           $this->link= $l;
00100                           $this->connected= true;
00101              }
00102 
00103              /**
00104               * execute this query
00105               * @return mixed
00106               */
00107              private function execute($sql) {
00108                           if (!$this->connected) {
00109                                        $this->connect();
00110                           }
00111 
00112                           $start= microtime(true);
00113                           $this->result= mssql_query($sql, $this->link);
00114 
00115                           if (false === $this->result) {
00116                                        writeLog(mssql_get_last_message().': '.$sql, KATA_ERROR);
00117                                        throw new DatabaseErrorException(mssql_get_last_message());
00118                           }
00119                           if (DEBUG > 0) {
00120                                        $this->queries[]= array (
00121                                                     kataGetLineInfo(),
00122                                                     $sql,
00123                                                     '',
00124                                                     mssql_get_last_message(),
00125                                                      (microtime(true) - $start).'sec'
00126                                        );
00127                           }
00128              }

00131               * unused right now, later possibly used by model to set right encoding

00134                           //TODO

00137              /**
00138               * return numbers of rows affected by last query
00139               * @return int
00140               */
00141              private function lastAffected() {
00142                           if ($this->link) {
00143                                        if (function_exists('mssql_rows_affected')) {
00144                                                     return mssql_rows_affected($this->link);
00145                                        } else {
00146                                                     $result= mssql_query("select @@rowcount as rows", $this->link);
00147                                                     $rows= mssql_fetch_assoc($result);
00148                                                     return $rows['rows'];
00149                                        }
00150                           }
00151                           return null;
00152              }
00153 
00154              /**
00155               * return id of primary key of last insert
00156               * @return int
00157               */
00158              private function lastInsertId() {
00159                           $this->execute("select SCOPE_IDENTITY() AS id");
00160                           if ($this->result) {
00161                                        $res= mssql_fetch_assoc($this->result);
00162                                        if ($res) {
00163                                                     $id= $res['id'];
00164                                                     if ($this->result) {
00165                                                                  mssql_free_result($this->result);
00166                                                     }
00167                                                     return $id;
00168                                        }
00169                           }
00170                           return null;
00171              }
00172 
00173              /**
00174               * return the result of the last query.
00175               * @param mixed $idname if $idname is false keys are simply incrementing from 0, if $idname is string the key is the value of the column specified in the string
00176               */
00177              private function & lastResult($idnames= false) {
00178                           do {
00179                                        $result= array ();
00180                                        if (mssql_num_rows($this->result) > 0) {
00181                                                     if ($idnames === false) {
00182                                                                  while ($row= mssql_fetch_assoc($this->result)) {
00183                                                                               $result[]= $row;
00184                                                                  }
00185                                                     } else {
00186                                                                  while ($row= mssql_fetch_assoc($this->result)) {
00187                                                                               $current= & $result;
00188                                                                               $current= & $result;
00189                                                                               foreach ($idnames as $idname) {
00190                                                                                            if (!isset ($row[$idname])) {
00191                                                                                                         throw new InvalidArgumentException('Cant order result by a field thats not in the resultset (forgot to select it?)');
00192                                                                                            }
00193                                                                                            $current= & $current[$row[$idname]];
00194                                                                               }
00195                                                                               $current= $row;
00196                                                                  }//while
00197                                                     }//idnames!=false
00198                                        }//num_rows>0
00199                           }//do
00200                           while (mssql_next_result($this->result));
00201 
00202                           return $result;
00203              }
00204 
00205              /**
00206               * execute query and return useful data depending on query-type
00207               *
00208               * @param string $s sql-statement
00209               * @param string $idname which field-value to use as the key of the returned array (false=dont care)
00210               * @return array
00211               */
00212              function & query($s, $idnames= false) {
00213                           $s= trim($s);
00214 
00215                           $this->execute($s);
00216 
00217                           $what= strtolower(substr($s, 0, 5));
00218                           $result= null;
00219                           switch ($what) {
00220                                        case 'repla' :
00221                                        case 'updat' :
00222                                        case 'delet' :
00223                                                     $result= $this->lastAffected();
00224                                                     return $result;
00225                                                     break;
00226 
00227                                        case 'inser' :
00228                                                     $result= $this->lastInsertId();
00229                                                     return $result;
00230                                                     break;
00231 
00232                                        case 'selec' :
00233                                        case 'show ' :
00234                                        case 'execu' :
00235                                        case 'exec ' :
00236                                        case 'decla' :
00237                                                     if (!is_Array($idnames)) {
00238                                                                  $idnames= array (
00239                                                                               $idnames
00240                                                                  );
00241                                                     }
00242                                                     $result= $this->lastResult($idnames);
00243                                                     return $result;
00244                                                     break;
00245 
00246                                        case 'trunc' :
00247                                                     $result= null;
00248                                                     return $result;
00249                                                     break;
00250                           }
00251 
00252                           throw new Exception('Dont know what to do with your query');
00253              }

00255              /**
00256               * escape the given string so it can be safely appended to any sql
00257               * @param string $sql string to escape
00258               * @return string
00259               */
00260              function escape($sql) {
00261                           return str_replace("'", "''", $sql);
00262              }
00263 
00264              /**
00265               * output any queries made, how long it took, the result and any errors if DEBUG
00266               */
00267              function __destruct() {
00268                           if (DEBUG > 0) {
00269                                        array_unshift($this->queries, array (
00270                                                     'line',
00271                                                     '',
00272                                                     'affected',
00273                                                     'error',
00274                                                     'time'
00275                                        ));
00276                                        kataDebugOutput($this->queries, true);
00277                           }
00278                           if ($this->connected) {
00279                                        mssql_close($this->link);
00280                           }
00281              }
00282 
00283              private function getFieldSize($str) {
00284                           $x1= strpos($str, '(');
00285                           $x2= strpos($str, ')');
00286                           if ((false !== $x1) && (false !== $x2)) {
00287                                        return substr($str, $x1 +1, $x2 - $x1 -1);
00288                           }
00289                           return 0;
00290              }
00291 
00292              /**
00293               * build a sql-string that returns paged data
00294               * @return string finished query
00295               */
00296              function getPageQuery($sql, $page, $perPage) {
00297                           return sprintf('%s LIMIT %d OFFSET %d', $sql, ($page -1) * $perPage, $perPage);
00298              }
00299 
00300              /**
00301               * return the sql needed to convert a unix timestamp to datetime
00302               * @param integer $t unixtime
00303               * @return string
00304               */
00305              function makeDateTime($t) {
00306                           return 'dateadd(ss,'.$t.',\'01/01/1970\')';
00307              }
00308 
00309              /**
00310               * try to reduce the fields of given table to the basic types bool, unixdate, int, string, float, date, enum
00311               *
00312               * <code>example:
00313               *
00314               * Array
00315               * (
00316               *     [table] => test
00317               *     [primary] => a
00318               *     [cols] => Array
00319               *         (
00320               *             [a] => Array
00321               *                 (
00322               *                     [default] => CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
00323               *                     [null] =>
00324               *                     [unique] =>
00325               *                     [length] => 0
00326               *                     [type] => date
00327               *                 )
00328               *
00329               *             [g] => Array
00330               *                 (
00331               *                     [default] =>
00332               *                     [null] =>
00333               *                     [unique] =>
00334               *                     [length] => 0
00335               *                     [type] => unsupported:time
00336               *                 )
00337               *
00338               *             [j] => Array
00339               *                 (
00340               *                     [default] =>
00341               *                     [null] =>
00342               *                     [unique] =>
00343               *                     [length] => 0
00344               *                     [type] => enum
00345               *                     [values] => Array
00346               *                         (
00347               *                             [0] => a
00348               *                             [1] => B
00349               *                             [2] => c
00350               *                         )
00351               *
00352               *                 )
00353               *
00354               *         )
00355               *
00356               * )
00357               * </code>
00358               *
00359               * @param string $tableName name of the table to analyze
00360               * @return unknown
00361               */
00362              function & describe($tableName) {
00363                           $primaryKey= false;
00364                           $desc= array ();
00365                           $r= mssql_query("SHOW COLUMNS FROM ".$tableName, $this->getLink());
00366                           if (false == $r) {
00367                                        throw new Exception('model: cant describe, missing rights?');
00368                           }
00369                           while ($row= mssql_fetch_assoc($r)) {
00370                                        $data= array ();
00371                                        $data['default']= empty ($row['Default']) ? false : $row['Default'];
00372                                        $data['null']= 'NO' != $row['Null'];
00373                                        $data['unique']= 'UNI' == $row['Key'];
00374                                        $data['length']= 0;
00375 
00376                                        if ('PRI' == $row['Key']) {
00377                                                     $primaryKey= $row['Field'];
00378                                        }
00379 
00380                                        if ('tinyint(1)' == $row['Type']) {
00381                                                     $data['type']= 'bool';
00382                                        } else
00383                                                     if (strpos($row['Type'], 'int(') !== false) {
00384                                                                  if (strpos($row['Type'], 'int(11)') !== false) {
00385                                                                               $data['type']= 'unixdate';
00386                                                                  } else {
00387                                                                               $data['type']= 'int';
00388                                                                  }
00389                                                                  $data['length']= $this->getFieldSize($row['Type']);
00390                                                     } else
00391                                                                  if (strpos($row['Type'], 'char(') !== false) {
00392                                                                               $data['type']= 'string';
00393                                                                               $data['length']= $this->getFieldSize($row['Type']);
00394                                                                  } else
00395                                                                               if (strpos($row['Type'], 'text') !== false) {
00396                                                                                            $data['type']= 'text';
00397                                                                               } else
00398                                                                                            if ('float' == $row['Type']) {
00399                                                                                                         $data['type']= 'float';
00400                                                                                            } else
00401                                                                                                         if (('timestamp' == $row['Type']) || ('datetime' == $row['Type'])) {
00402                                                                                                                      $data['type']= 'date';
00403                                                                                                         } else
00404                                                                                                                      if (strpos($row['Type'], 'enum(') !== false) {
00405                                                                                                                                   $data['type']= 'enum';
00406                                                                                                                                   $temp= explode(',', $this->getFieldSize($row['Type'])); //TODO a bad idea (!)
00407                                                                                                                                   foreach ($temp as $n => & $v) {
00408                                                                                                                                                if ((strlen($v) > 2) && ("'" == substr($v, 0, 1)) && ("'" == substr($v, -1, 1))) {
00409                                                                                                                                                             $v= substr($v, 1, strlen($v) - 2);
00410                                                                                                                                                }
00411                                                                                                                                   }
00412                                                                                                                                   $data['values']= $temp;
00413                                                                                                                      } else {
00414                                                                                                                                   $data['type']= 'unsupported:'.$row['Type'];
00415                                                                                                                      }
00416 
00417                                        $desc[$row['Field']]= $data;
00418                           }
00419 
00420                           $desc= array (
00421                                        'table' => str_replace(array (
00422                                                     $this->quoteLeft,
00423                                                     $this->quoteRight
00424                                        ), '', $tableName),
00425                                        'primary' => $primaryKey,
00426                                        'cols' => $desc
00427                           );
00428                           return $desc;
00429              }
